hobby.Orcs (Middle-earth):
Making new weapons of mass destruction.
Killing and eating enemies and each other.
hobby.Dementors:
Guarding.
Consuming human happiness and souls.
hobby.Reborn: Training to imbue the ways of the Sith.
hobby.Geonosians:
Executing intruders
Torturing captive Geonosian beasts
hobby.Droidekas:
Destroying Republic units
Standing up against the Jedi
hobby.Pillar Men:
Crying frantically to calm down (Esidisi).
Fighting and training himself constantly (Wamuu).
Feeding anything and everything (Santana).
Being unpredictable through unexpected behaviors (Kars).
hobby.Wiggler: Minding their own businesses until someone makes them mad
hobby.Predators:
Hunting their prey and skinning them
Collecting worthy preys' skulls as trophies
hobby.Shy Guys: Wearing masks because they are too shy
hobby.Daleks: Always being in constant state of rage.
hobby.Hollows: Devouring Humans Souls, Killing both dead and living Humans, Sacrificing Human Souls to be turned into Hollows
hobby.Noise:
Consuming souls of their victims
Amplifying their victims' negative emotions
hobby.Xenomorphs: Killing either for food or capturing potential host to build an army/populating their hive.
hobby.Nobodies (Kingdom Hearts): Doing whatever activities they can to fill their emotional emptiness
hobby.Martians (War of the Worlds):
Slaughtering humans (via their machines).
Harvesting humans for consumption of blood.
Waging war.
hobby.Great Evils: Keeping each other at bay (one side craves more power, the other side maintains it)
hobby.Fiends of Chaos: Causing destruction in the human world.
hobby.Graboids: Eating any human that they come into contact with.
hobby.SkekS\u00e8s:
Valuing power above all else.
Plotting against each other.
hobby.Xorda:
Harboring grudges towards those who they perceive wronged them.
Unleashing their grudges on cataclysmic scale.
hobby.Dark Eldar:
Designing weapons to inflict maximum pain and suffering.
Revelling in and feeding upon miseries of others.
Dedicating themselves to a non-stop war with Materium.
Pursuing ever greater powers.
Planning raids and carnages in meticulous detail.
Breaking the bodies of their captives and crushing their spirits.
Reshaping expired slaves into undying trophies or even grotesque items of jewelry and furniture.
Committing piracy.

goals.Heartless:
Consume all light (failed).
Consume all hearts (failed).
To plunge the universe into eternal darkness (failed).
goals.Nazg\u00fbl:
Take the Ring from Frodo and return it to Sauron (failed).
Help Sauron rule Middle-Earth (failed).
goals.Orcs (Middle-earth):
Obey the commands of whichever Dark Lord leads them (succeeded).
Take over the world (failed).
goals.Dementors:
Prevent any breakouts from Azkaban and punish all Dark Wizards (succeeded).
Assist Lord Voldemort in taking over the Muggle and Magical worlds (failed).
goals.Reborn: Bring back the ideals of Emperor Palpatine and ultimately the Galactic Empire itself.
goals.MagnaGuards: Protect Grievous or whomever they are programmed to protect.
goals.Geonosians:
Defeat Galactic Republic.
Manufacture Droid armies for the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
Serve Hive Queens.
goals.Droidekas: Helping the Trade Federation in their goals.
goals.Tusken Raiders: Beat up, drive away or kill anyone who intrude their turfs.
goals.Pillar Men:
Become the ultimate life form (Kars).
Assist Kars achieving ulmate life form (Esidisi).
Fight and defeat strongest opponents (Wamuu).
Feed to survive, find and rejoin His masters (Santana).
Exterminate Hamon users (common goal).
goals.Kraken (mythology): Eat as many sailors as possible <small>(succeeded)</small>.
goals.Wiggler:
Defeat Mario and Luigi (if they anger them).
Help out Mario and Luigi (if they please them).
goals.Shroobs:
Conquer, terraform and annex Mushroom Kingdom into part of Shroob hegemony.
Eliminated all that oppose them.
goals.Predators:
Hunt the most dangerous game available.
Collecting the DNA of the strongest members of their prey to become stronger.
goals.Omnidroids:
Eliminate all Heroes they face (formerly; mostly succeeded).
Help Syndrome become a "hero" (abandoned)
goals.Shy Guys: Serve Wart (later Bowser) and kill Mario team.
goals.Daleks:
Eradicate all "inferior races".
Achieve universal conquest.
goals.Hollows: Devour as many souls as possible (For Menos) Continually evolve to next Menos class
goals.Leviathan (Metroid):
Spread Phazon throughout the Universe (succeeded).
Make planetary clones of Phaaze (failed).
goals.Xenomorphs: Spread and expand Xenomorph colonies as far as they can reach.
goals.Nobodies (Kingdom Hearts):
Regain their hearts.
Find the answer to whether they truly have no emotions.
goals.Martians (War of the Worlds):
Invade and conquer Earth, take over its natural resources, and claim it as their own planet (failed).
Wipe out humanity and all of Earth's life (failed).
Conquer and rule as many planets as possible (failed).
goals.Fiends of Chaos:
Ensure Garland's survival.
Destroy the Warriors of Light.
goals.The Borg: To Assimilate all life in the Universe to bring order to chaos.
goals.Slitheen Family:
Manipulate the human world into launching the nuclear weapons against the rest of the World and tirggering World War III.
Sell Earth's radioactive remains as starship fuel after WW3.
Open the rift there and blow up Earth.
Avenge the Passameer-Days by placing transducers around Earth to absorb the Sun's energy in order to destroy Earth.
Crash the Moon into Earth.
goals.Sentinels: Defeat and destroy every each mutant in the world including the X-Men even if it means to hurt the humans.
goals.Graboids: Eat as much as they can.
goals.The Thing:
Survive and repopulate (failed).
Conquer the planet earth under Whitley's command (videogame only; failed).
Assimilate Sam Carter (succeeded).
Assimilate everything and everyone that gets in its way including Kate Lloyd and R.J. MacReady (failed).
goals.Darkened Creatures: Serve Skeksis and obey Skeksis' will.
goals.SkekS\u00e8s:
Attain immortality so they can continue their tyrannical reign over Thra for all of eternity.
Stay separated from their benevolent alter-egos (both failed).
goals.Dark Man:
Frame Proto Man (succeeded)
Defeat Mega Man (failed)
goals.Thiima: Destroy planet Amnelia to ensure peace in the universe.
goals.Rabbids:
Conquer Rayman's World and exact vengeance on those who made fun of them.
Destroy Rayman through series of gladiatorial events. (All Succeeded)
goals.Basilisk (Harry Potter):
Aid the Heir of Slytherin with cleansing Hogwarts of Muggle-borns.
Kill Harry Potter (both failed).
goals.Anti-Fairies: To cause bad lucks on earth.
goals.Xorda:
Purge all lifeforms of Mobius.
Purge all lifeforms who wronged them.
goals.Tyranids: Propagate, multiply, evolve and survive by consuming Imperium and their allies.
goals.Klingons: Expand their spheres of influence by conquering numerous systems and incorporating them.
goals.Dark Eldar: Wreak carnage across the galaxy and feed upon suffering souls of their victims universe-wide.
goals.Zombies (Zombieland):
Eat any living they can get their hands on.
Convert livings into them and propagate their numbers.
goals.Killer Klowns: Harvest enough humans for food as they have with many different victims on other planets they have invaded before.
